name: VSAccountMetadataRequest
desc: An object that specifies what subscriber account information your app retrieves.

items.name: var includeAccountProviderIdentifier: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether your app requests the identifier of the account provider.

items.name: var includeAuthenticationExpirationDate: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether your app requests the expiration date of the userâ€™s current authentication session.

items.name: var attributeNames: [String]
items.desc: The SAML attributes that your app sends to the account provider.

items.name: var channelIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The channel identifier for the request.

items.name: var supportedAccountProviderIdentifiers: [String]
items.desc: A list of identifiers for TV providers that your app supports.

items.name: var supportedAuthenticationSchemes: [VSAccountProviderAuthenticationScheme]
items.desc: A collection of authentication schemes your app supports for this request.

items.name: var verificationToken: String?
items.desc: A token that your app sends to an account provider to identify itself.

items.name: var isInterruptionAllowed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether your app can prompt the user to authenticate to complete the request.

items.name: var featuredAccountProviderIdentifiers: [String]
items.desc: The providers your app lists prominently during authentication.

items.name: var forceAuthentication: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app ignores cached credentials.

items.name: var localizedVideoTitle: String?
items.desc: A short, user-presentable name for the video that the user wants to play.

items.name: var accountProviderAuthenticationToken: String?
items.desc: An authentication session token that your app sends to the account provider.
